text: A beginner’s version of the Tortoise (乌龟) and the Hare (兔子).A more precise word for hare is 野兔.兔子和乌龟在夏天比赛跑步。兔子跑得很快，她看见乌龟还在慢慢地走，就先在树下睡觉了。乌龟虽然走得很慢，但是他没有停下，一直走。兔子睡醒的时候，乌龟已经赢了。这个故事告诉我们不要放弃，坚持就会有结果。A rabbit  and a turtle ran in the summer race.The rabbit ran very fast. She saw the turtle walking slowly, and went to sleep under the tree.Although the turtle went very slowly, he did not stop and kept going.When the rabbit woke up, the turtle had already won.This story tells us not to give up, and that perseverance will give us results.1 – 一开始谁跑得快？a. 猫b. 兔子c. 狗d. 乌龟2 – 最后谁赢了？a. 猫b. 兔子c. 狗d. 乌龟1. b2. dReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
